text: Eyes of the Heart is a 1920 American crime drama movie directed by Paul Powell and was based on the story Blindness by Dana Burnet. It stars Mary Miles Minter, Edmund Burns, Loyola O'Connor, F. A. Turner and Lucien Littlefield. It was distributed by Realart Pictures Corporation. ==Other websites== * * Category:1920 drama movies Category:1920s crime movies Category:American silent movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Paul Powell
title: Eyes of the Heart (movie)
